channel.title: Tobias Ara Svensson
channel.description: Recent content on Tobias Ara Svensson

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Gothenburg-based technologist with deep experience building and scaling distributed systems. When not at Forza Football getting done whatever needs getting done, I hack on open source projects, explore nature and learn new things. Move fast, take risks, release early, keep things simple and be a cheerful spirit.

item.title: Experiments Over Discussions
item.description: Remember the last time you had a long, heated discussion and found a perfect solution? Me neither. Wouldn’t it be amazing to have a better way to resolve arguments? I recall a particularly exhausting discussion that went on for over a month. Long ago I worked on large scale distributed system. At some point we found a potential issue that could lead to lost updates in our data sets.
